TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit OrderedDictionary extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class OrderedDictionary Implements IDeserializationCallback, IDictionary, IOrderedDictionary, ISerializable

summary.span: 表示可依索引鍵或索引存取的索引鍵/值組集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of key/value pairs that are accessible by the key or index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個項目是儲存在索引鍵/值組物件。Each element is a key/value pair stored in a object. 金鑰不能`null`，但是值可以是。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be. 項目未排序的索引鍵的項目與類別。The elements of an are not sorted by the key, unlike the elements of a class. 您可以在索引鍵或索引存取項目。You can access elements either by the key or by the index. `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 的集合中每個項目類型的傳回物件。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`For Each` in Visual Basic) returns objects that are of the type of each element in the collection. 因為每個項目集合的索引鍵/值組，此項目類型不是索引鍵的類型或值的類型。Since each element of the collection is a key/value pair, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 相反地，項目型別是。Instead, the element type is . 下列程式碼會示範 C#、 Visual Basic 和 c + + 語法。The following code shows C#, Visual Basic and C++ syntax. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#06](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/source2.cpp#06)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#06](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/source2.cs#06)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#06](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/source2.vb#06)] `foreach`陳述式是包裝函式，只允許讀取，不寫入至集合的列舉值。The `foreach` statement is a wrapper around the enumerator, which only allows reading from, not writing to, the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立、 母體及修改集合，以及兩種方法可以顯示的內容： 一個使用和屬性和其他建立列舉值，透過方法。The following code example demonstrates the creation, population and modification of an collection, as well as two techniques to display the contents of the : one using the and properties and the other creating an enumerator through the method. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#00](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/ordereddictionary1.cpp#00)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/OrderedDictionary1.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/OrderedDictionary1.vb#00)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 在每個索引鍵必須是唯一的集合。Every key in a collection must be unique. 預設比較子是索引鍵的實作。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和擴展集合。The following code example demonstrates the creation and population of an collection. 此程式碼是較大的程式碼範例，您可以在部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . remarks.format: ## Remarks 金鑰不能`null`，但是值可以是。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be. 您也可以使用加入新項目，藉由設定機碼值的屬性不存在於集合; 不過，如果指定的索引鍵已存在於，設定屬性會覆寫舊的值。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the collection; however, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 相反地，方法不會修改現有的項目，但改為擲回。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements but instead throws . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和擴展集合。The following code example demonstrates the creation and population of an collection. 此程式碼是較大的程式碼範例，您可以在部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性可以傳回 null 值，如果沒有索引鍵或索引鍵是`null`。Using the property can return a null value if the key does not exist or if the key is `null`. 使用方法來判斷是否特定的索引鍵存在於集合。Use the method to determine if a specific key exists in the collection. 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，這個方法會使用集合的物件和方法`item`來判斷是否`item`存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `item` to determine whether `item` exists. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，藉由進行這項判斷和方法`item`參數集合中的物件。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何修改集合。The following code example demonstrates the modification of an collection. 在此範例中，方法用來判斷項目是否存在於之前嘗試將它移除。In this example, the method is used to determine if an entry exists before attempting to remove it. 此程式碼是較大的程式碼範例，您可以在部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . summary.span: 傳回在 集合中逐一查看的 物件。

span.span: Returns an object that iterates through the collection.
An object for the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，使用`foreach`建議而不是直接管理 列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法顯示的內容到主控台的集合。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to display the contents of the collection to the console. 在此範例中，方法用來取得傳遞至方法，顯示的內容的物件。In this example, the method is used to obtain an object that is passed to a method that displays the contents. 此程式碼是較大的程式碼範例，您可以在部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#03](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/ordereddictionary1.cpp#03)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#03](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/OrderedDictionary1.cs#03)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#03](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/OrderedDictionary1.vb#03)] [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#05](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/ordereddictionary1.cpp#05)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#05](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/OrderedDictionary1.cs#05)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#05](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/OrderedDictionary1.vb#05)]

summary.span: 使用指定的索引鍵和值，將新元素插入 集合中指定的索引處。

span.span: Inserts a new entry into the collection with the specified key and value at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`index`參數中的項目數目等於集合，`key`和`value`參數附加至集合結尾。If the `index` parameter is equal to the number of entries in the collection, the `key` and `value` parameters are appended to the end of the collection. 後面接著插入點的項目向下移動以容納新項目，並移動項目的索引也會更新。Entries that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new entry and the indexes of the moved entries are also updated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何修改集合。The following code example demonstrates the modification of an collection. 在此範例中，方法用來將新的項目加入至開頭，向下移動其餘的項目。In this example, the method is used to add a new entry to the beginning of the , moving the rest of the entries down. 此程式碼是較大的程式碼範例，您可以在部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/ordereddictionary1.cpp#02)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/OrderedDictionary1.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/OrderedDictionary1.vb#02)]

span.span: is out of range.
This collection is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示 集合是否為唯讀。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.

value.span: 如果 集合是唯讀則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the collection is read-only; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 是唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只會防止在集合中，修改的包裝函式與因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modification of the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何修改集合。The following code example demonstrates the modification of an collection. 在此範例中，屬性用來判斷是否可以進行修改。In this example, the property is used to determine whether the can be modified. 此程式碼是較大的程式碼範例，您可以在部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/ordereddictionary1.cpp#02)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/OrderedDictionary1.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/OrderedDictionary1.vb#02)]

summary.span: 取得或設定指定的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the specified value.

Default Public Property Item(index As Integer) As Object
public: property System::Object ^ default[int] { System::Object ^ get(int index); void set(int index, System::Object ^ value); };

param.span: 要取得或設定的值之以零為起始的索引。

summary.span: 取得或設定指定之索引處的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value at the specified index.

value.span: 指定之索引處的項目值。

span.span: The value of the item at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可讓您可以使用下列語法存取集合中的特定元素： `myCollection[index]`。This property allows you to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality.

exception.span: 正在設定屬性，且 集合是唯讀的。

span.span: The property is being set and the collection is read-only.
is less than zero.

Default Public Property Item(key As Object) As Object
public: property System::Object ^ default[System::Object ^] { System::Object ^ get(System::Object ^ key); void set(System::Object ^ key, System::Object ^ value); };

param.name: key
param.span: 要取得或設定之值的索引鍵。

span.span: The key of the value to get or set.

summary.span: 取得或設定具有指定之索引鍵的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value with the specified key.

value.span: 與指定之索引鍵關聯的值。

span.span: The value associated with the specified key.

value.span: 如果找不到指定的索引鍵，嘗試取得將傳回 ，並且嘗試設定會使用指定的索引鍵建立新的元素。

span.span: If the specified key is not found, attempting to get it returns , and attempting to set it creates a new element using the specified key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可讓您可以使用下列語法存取集合中的特定元素： `myCollection[key]`。This property allows you to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]`. 您也可以使用加入新項目，藉由設定機碼值的屬性不存在於集合 (例如， `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`)。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the collection (for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`). 不過，如果指定的索引鍵已存在於，設定屬性會覆寫舊的值。However, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 相反地，方法不會修改現有的項目。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 金鑰不能`null`，但是值可以是。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be. 區別`null`傳回因為找不到指定的索引鍵和`null`傳回指定之索引鍵的值，所以`null`，使用方法，以判斷碼是否存在.To distinguish between `null` that is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` that is returned because the value of the specified key is `null`, use the method to determine if the key exists in the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何修改集合。The following code example demonstrates the modification of an collection. 在此範例中，屬性用來修改與索引鍵的字典項目`"testKey2"`。In this example, the property is used to modify the dictionary entry with the key `"testKey2"`. 此程式碼是較大的程式碼範例，您可以在部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/ordereddictionary1.cpp#02)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/OrderedDictionary1.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/OrderedDictionary1.vb#02)]

span.span: Gets an object containing the keys in the collection.

value.span: 物件，其中包含 集合中的索引鍵。

span.span: An object containing the keys in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回物件不是靜態的複本; 相反地，中原始的索引鍵是指回集合。The returned object is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the keys in the original collection. 因此，變更為才會反映在繼續。Therefore, changes to the continue to be reflected in the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和擴展集合，然後再列印到主控台內容。The following code example demonstrates the creation and population of an collection, and then prints the contents to the console. 在此範例中，和屬性傳遞至方法，顯示的內容。In this example, the and properties are passed to a method that displays the contents. 此程式碼是較大的程式碼範例，您可以在部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . summary.span: 從 集合移除具有指定之索引鍵的元素。

span.span: Removes the entry with the specified key from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除的項目向上移動，以佔用空出的位置，而且移動之項目的索引也會更新。The entries that follow the removed entry move up to occupy the vacated spot and the indexes of the entries that move are also updated. 如果集合未包含具有指定之索引鍵的項目則維持不變，並擲回任何例外狀況。If the collection does not contain an entry with the specified key, the remains unchanged and no exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何修改集合。The following code example demonstrates the modification of an collection. 在此範例中，方法用來移除具有索引鍵的項目`"keyToDelete"`從。In this example, the method is used to remove the entry with the key `"keyToDelete"` from the . 此程式碼是較大的程式碼範例，您可以在部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at .
